name: Phoenix
description: Phoenix, the immortal bird that rises from ashes, embodies hope and rebirth.

skills.name: Flaming Rebirth
skills.description: When Phoenix falls, she casts Rise From Ashes. If she is the only remaining unit and under Rise From Ashes, the battle is lost (can only trigger once per battle). (Rise From Ashes: Becomes untargetable, restores 15% of max HP per sec, revives when HP is fully restored.)

upgrades.level2: Keeps her Energy upon revival. (Unlocks at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Rise From Ashes can now trigger unlimited times. If she is the only remaining unit and under Rise From Ashes, the battle is lost. (Unlocks at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: When Phoenix casts Rise From Ashes for the first time, she gains 50% max HP. (Unlocks at Relic Lv.30)

skills.name: Ashes to Everflame
skills.description: Phoenix targets the farthest unit, sacrificing 50% of her max HP to summon a phoenix that strikes the target, dealing DMG equal to 240% of her ATK + 100% of sacrificed HP to the target and all units along the path.

upgrades.level3: Increases the conversion ratio of sacrificed HP to 120%.

skills.name: Blazing Feather
skills.description: Each Phoenix's Normal Attack consumes 10% of her current HP, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK and inflicting a stack of Soul Burn on the target. (Soul Burn: Deals DMG equal to 75% of ATK every 2s for 10s, stacking up to 10 times.)

upgrades.level2: Increases the ATK bonus of Soul Burn to 85%.
upgrades.level3: Units with Soul Burn explode when falling, dealing DMG equal to 50% Phoenix's ATK Ã— Soul Burn stacks to nearby enemies.
upgrades.level4: Increases the ATK bonus of Soul Burn to 100%.

skills.name: Rise From Ashes
skills.description: Phoenix gains 5% ATK SPD for every 10% of max HP lost, stacking up to 10 times.

relic.name: Scorching Remedy
relic.description: Phoenix restores HP equal to 200% of ATK + 25% of lost HP over 10s.

upgrades.level3: The healing effect is increased to 30% when her HP drops below 50%.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 250% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.281)
